about_the_game:
TimeTekker is a pure arcade shoot em' up where your actions control the speed of time!
Utilize bullet deflection, ninja stars, and slow motion powers to outlast an infinite onslaught of bug creatures! Xbox controllers are supported during gameplay!
This game is also completely free to own!


Compete online against the world in a constant free for all score-fest!
Earn divisional rankings for your progress against other players. Rank up your ninja from Styrofoam tier to Silver, Gold, and beyond, beating down the opposition with your superior scoring skills! Show off your mastery with newly added Steam Achievements!


Multiple difficulty modes, ranging from balanced to absolutely impossible!
From people new to shoot em' ups to the most hardcore veterans of the genre, TimeTekker has something for everybody.


This game started as a prototype in Quinnipiac University's GDD Program, but after a year of development, it's become more than I ever imagined. I hope you enjoy this little homage to all the shoot em' up games that I grew up with. Happy scoring!

- Ryan O'Hara, Artii Games LLC
detailed_description:
A Golden Joystick Award-Winning Game!


About the Game


TimeTekker is a pure arcade shoot em' up where your actions control the speed of time!
Utilize bullet deflection, ninja stars, and slow motion powers to outlast an infinite onslaught of bug creatures! Xbox controllers are supported during gameplay!
This game is also completely free to own!


Compete online against the world in a constant free for all score-fest!
Earn divisional rankings for your progress against other players. Rank up your ninja from Styrofoam tier to Silver, Gold, and beyond, beating down the opposition with your superior scoring skills! Show off your mastery with newly added Steam Achievements!


Multiple difficulty modes, ranging from balanced to absolutely impossible!
From people new to shoot em' ups to the most hardcore veterans of the genre, TimeTekker has something for everybody.


This game started as a prototype in Quinnipiac University's GDD Program, but after a year of development, it's become more than I ever imagined. I hope you enjoy this little homage to all the shoot em' up games that I grew up with. Happy scoring!

- Ryan O'Hara, Artii Games LLC

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: tested on "Manjaro"
  • Processor: Intel Celeron CPU N2840
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required in the game's initial setup, but afterwards, internet is no longer required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 615
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required in the game's initial setup, but afterwards, internet is no longer required.

name: TimeTekker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Celeron CPU N2840
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required in the game's initial setup, but afterwards, internet is no longer required.

reviews:
“Fun and addictive arcade-style bullet-hell arena-survival game with interesting mechanics.”
Recommended – Steam Curator: IndieGems

“Very well done arcade-style shoot em' up game with good animations, diversified weapons and a good soundtrack.”
★★★★★ – Steam Curator: Excellent Reviews

“extremely addictive gameplay, though quite challenging...”
Recommended – Steam Curator: LifeIsReallyStrange
short_description: TimeTekker is an arcade shoot em' up where your actions dictate the speed of time itself! Overcome the endless hail of bullets at your own pace and become the ultimate ninja!
